alert.note: Alert for Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 7:03AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Georgetown and central Williamsburg Counties through 745 AM EST... At 701 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strengthening thunderstorm over Northern Lake Moultrie, or 13 miles north of Moncks Corner, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hemingway, Rhems, Trio, Warsaw, Salters, Nesmith, Indiantown, Gourdin, Earle, Morrisville, Henry, Lane, and Stuckey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
